alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 1:58PM CDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River near Milford. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, minor flooding of low lying agricultural lands begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 12.7 feet Monday evening. Additional rises may be possible into the middle to later part of next week. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Little Sioux River Milford 12.0 11.8 Fri 1 pm 12.1 12.4 12.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 400 PM CDT.
